info.name: Ken_PA MedHelp User Configurable
info.description:
Try a site like the following to choose your background colors:
http://www.colorhexa.com/color-names

You can then paste in the hex values that you get from there (e.g. #5d8aa8 is Air Force blue), or else click any color box below to use the color picker. 4.21.2017a also hides all comment boxes and 1st answer box.
info.additionalInfo: 4.21.2017a  also hides all comment boxes and 1st answer box
